name: Legendary Belted Tractor
description:
Join the arena and drive your Legendary Belted Tractor , crashing into the others and destroying their Belted Tractors, before they get the chance to destroy yours. Pick up power ups that will help you, buy upgrades and repair your Belted Tractor between levels and try to complete them all, so you can be the last one standing.Your opponents will try to push you out of the game.This is one of the Most addictive physics-based 3D Action game!

Are you ready for the challenge?

Features:
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
- Tracks are modeled after real life locations.
- Compete against opponents of varying skill level.
